title: Thunderbird 115 unified view not showing junk folders from all accounts
content: Before upgrading to 115 unified folders worked fine. After upgrading it only shows the junk mail folders for 2/6 accounts on both Windows 10 PC and laptop. Looking at properties for the ones that do show and the ones that don't there is no difference. There is no Choose button under the colour icon as suggested in another post. Help greatly appreciated.
creator: andrewj1072

title: mail inviate perse
content: Buongiorno, la posta inviata è scomparsa ed è rimasta solo quella da luglio in avanti. Quella da luglio 2023 sino a tutti gli anni indietro non c'è più! sono circa 7/8 anni di posta persa E' scomparsa anche su tophost dove è registrato il dominio. Como posso recuperarla? Grazie Stefano
creator: archistemi

title: Can't view group tags in inbox anymore - tag greyed out - why?!
content:
I tag EVERYTHING, then I work on one tag subject at a time (billing, Work In Progress, Sales Demo Requests, etc. - I can no longer do View>sortby>tags view>sortby Group - this is extremely frustrating since the new update. I need to sort by tags & group them, in order leave the untagged at the top so I can see what I have left to tag.

If I use the tag feature now it will let me select one or more that I have already tagged but completely leaves out the option to see my UNtagged messages. Am I missing something? I know everyone hates change, this new version went way too far in my opinion with the number of "improvements" thrown at the user at once.

I need the sortby group on tags back PLEASE!!!!!! or tell me how to do it another way if I have to.

IMO Its going to be overwhelming for the average user and I'm much savvier than most for my age and we work in software development too and have to release new versions to our clients. So I get it. But man, this new version is slowing down my work flow - Shift M was my friend to move emails into client folders - yes, I found its now CTR SHFT M to move but I set it back to Shift M until they take that away.

Not a fan at all and I work on MAC and PC's I miss having the number of read and unread total in the lower right - turning on the read and unread only works on the folder level and quite frankly it gives me ptsd to see all the total number of emails I've handled in 25 years in each folder. I just need to see the inbox.

I really hope the tag /sort group feature comes back - PLEASE
creator: mariah2

title: Update 115.2.3 reliability
content:
Updated yesterday to the latest version of Supernova 115.2.3. It added two new Local Folders, both Bin and neither added by me. I deleted ... without additional issues that I am aware of.

How stable is this new release ... should I revert to pre 115?
creator: RonSH

title: Thunderbird can send mail but not receive ay.
content: My Thunderbird can send mail but cannot receive any. I have tried many times from another e-mail account but they never appear in the in-box . I have checked my settings and they seem okay. I use Imap for the incoming messages (but there are not any)

title: keyboard / arrow navigation in calendar?
content:
Hello,

I hoped, that "supernova" would have these possibillities, but I could not find them. Did I missed something?

title: Thunderbird freezing whenever I open a folder in a new tab or window
content:
Since installing Supernova, I find a huge (multiple minute) delay whenever I open a folder to a new tab or window. There was zero delay on the prior version to open a folder, so it appears to be specific to Supernova. I'm surprised that no one else has mentioned it on the forums yet, so it seems it might just be something about my particular setup. Can anyone help me diagnose what I might be doing wrong?

Thanks!
creator: lowraxe

title: Image in html footer won't load in
content:
on a PC running TB v102, my simple html email footer includes an image (in the same folder) the image loads in to new emails fine,

however a PC running latest TB v115, the same html file & image, does not load the image into new emails, just blank rectangle (viewing the html file in a browser does work) 

Any thoughts ?
